title: Tsunami in a Bottle
summaries: The Tsunami in a Bottle is an Accessory found in Wooden, Iron, Pearlwood, and Mythril Crates. It gives the player a double jump ability, similar to other Bottle Accessories. The Tsunami in a Bottle's double jump height is marginally greater than that of the Cloud in a Bottle, but does not reach as high as the Blizzard in a Bottle, Fart in a Jar, or Sandstorm in a Bottle. The Tsunami in a Bottle also visually replaces the effect upon double jumping with a burst of water.

Reaching two blocks further than the Cloud in a Bottle, the Tsunami in a Bottle comes just one block short of the Blizzard in a Bottle's maximum jump height, yet lacks the speed boost function that blizzard and those greater than it share.
